questions.answer: This connectivity catastrophe occurs when all WiFi signals worldwide suddenly become audible as annoying buzzing sounds
questions.question: What is audible interference pandemic?

questions.answer: In this routing nightmare, all network packets worldwide begin taking the longest possible path to their destinations instead of the shortest
questions.question: What is maximum latency routing?

questions.answer: This protocol disaster unfolds when all TCP packets worldwide arrive out of order, making reliable communication impossible
questions.question: What is packet ordering apocalypse?

questions.answer: In this DNS disaster, every domain name worldwide suddenly resolves to a single IP address, causing massive connectivity chaos
questions.question: What is universal DNS redirection?

questions.answer: This ultimate network failure happens when all data packets worldwide begin spontaneously duplicating themselves, flooding all networks
questions.question: What is infinite packet replication?
